name: Antivirus (Tc70t)
description:
This is a game that is in development, i don't really know where im going with this but i hope to add more levels and bosses, maybe a few more gamemodes.

This game is about playing as an antivirus that has to eliminate all the viruses in a computer.

If you have any ideas for game mechanics, bosses and stuff like that. Please comment them. 

I will probably make this a short game and move on to a different game. I'm still learning to code but i'm doing my best. 

(P.S. There is still no sound...)
